posts.post_content:
Posted By: Martin Neal
I am selling most of my T205s to finish the T206s. Thanks to all who have helped in the past. Scans available per request. Requests for scans does not "hold " cards. I will pay shipping, but if paying with Paypal, please add 3%.

Posted By: Mike Taylor
Email sent.

Posted By: Scott
I'll take the Red Sox Carrigan PSA 5 if it's still available.
Thanks,
Scott.

Please e-mail your mailing address and I'll send a check to scottg@accessmfgsys.com

Posted By: Rawn Hill
Damn work!! Beaten to the Carrigan.

Rawn

Posted By: Martin Neal
Hi Scott,

  I just sent you an email. Rawn, sorry about the Reulbach.

Posted By: Mike Taylor
Martin,

Email sent yesterday saying I'll take the Crandall.

Posted By: Ed Cavagnaro
Martin,
   
 I'll take the "Foxen" if still available (plus some scans).  Thanks - email sent... 

 Ed

Posted By: Rawn Hill
Ya right, look at the login. I fail to realize that after this much time that anyone would put a Carrigan out for sale without contacting me first. Such is life, I would have gone to $140.

Rawn

Posted By: Martin Neal
That was unnecessary. Such is the nature of the BST. I would have loved for you to have the card, but I am a collector not a dealer. It may be that I work construction all day and don't have the time or the resources to pinpoint all potential buyers so I can maximize every sale. Hell, if only I had slept in a Holiday Inn that night I could have made an extra $50.00

Posted By: Rawn Hill
Terribly sorry, I was way out of line.

Rawn

Posted By: Martin Neal
 Rawn,Ditto on my apologies too. I've been upset on missng cards I need. I certainly will call you first next time I have a Carrigan for sale. Good luck hunting
